definition[0]: a large powerful computer that can work very fast and that a lot of people can use at the same time
example[0]: If a problem does occur, a signal is automatically sent to the mainframe.
definition[1]: a large powerful computer that can do many complicated jobs very fast and that a lot of people can use at the same time. Users are connected to the mainframe through TERMINALs
example[1]: a network of computers linked to a mainframe
